Title: Desparately Seeking Skorthuz
Description:
Eh? Who are you? Oh that's right, I heard that there were new folk about.

Say, are you heading north? If so, keep an eye out for my friend, Skorthuz, will you? The laggard was due back an hour ago but is nowhere to be seen. I heard he was heading towards Chittering Den for some awful reason. 

If you see him, tell him to hurry up and get back here or I'm drinking alone!
ObjectivesText: Look for Skorthuz around the Chittering Den.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Look for Skorthuz around the Chittering Den
